p: Since the potently antiproliferative activity of chalcone D6 against MOLT-4 cells, we also evaluated the anticancer effects of chalcone D6 on xenograft models bearing MOLT-4 cells. After the treatment of chalcone D6 (60 mg/kg and 100 mg/kg), the body weight of mice, the tumour weight and the tumour volume were measured and recorded. As shown in Figure 10, chalcone D6 inhibited tumour growth remarkably, while the body weight was almost unchanged, suggesting the antitumor efficacy and low global toxicity.
